Package com.irurueta.numerical.polynomials.estimators

Interface PolynomialRobustEstimatorListener

public interface PolynomialRobustEstimatorListener
Listener to be notified of events such as when estimation starts, ends or when progress changes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onEstimateEnd(PolynomialRobustEstimator estimator)
    Called when an estimator ends the polynomial estimation process.
    void
    onEstimateNextIteration(PolynomialRobustEstimator estimator, int iteration)
    Called when estimator iterates to refine a possible solution.
    void
    onEstimateProgressChange(PolynomialRobustEstimator estimator, float progress)
    Called when estimation progress changes significantly.
    void
    onEstimateStart(PolynomialRobustEstimator estimator)
    Called when an estimator starts the polynomial estimation process.

  • Method Details

    • onEstimateStart

      void onEstimateStart(PolynomialRobustEstimator estimator)
      Called when an estimator starts the polynomial estimation process.
      Parameters:
      estimator - reference to a polynomial robust estimator.

    • onEstimateEnd

      void onEstimateEnd(PolynomialRobustEstimator estimator)
      Called when an estimator ends the polynomial estimation process.
      Parameters:
      estimator - reference to a polynomial robust estimator.

    • onEstimateNextIteration

      void onEstimateNextIteration(PolynomialRobustEstimator estimator, int iteration)
      Called when estimator iterates to refine a possible solution.
      Parameters:
      estimator - reference to a polynomial robust estimator.
      iteration - current iteration.

    • onEstimateProgressChange

      void onEstimateProgressChange(PolynomialRobustEstimator estimator, float progress)
      Called when estimation progress changes significantly.
      Parameters:
      estimator - reference to a polynomial robust estimator.
      progress - progress of estimation expressed as a value between 0.0 and 1.0.
